Sentinel Knight Alberius: May the divine protection of Eva be with you. I am Sentinel Knight Smallberry, commander of the "Sentinels" that guard the holy forest and the Mother Tree Glade. The building you see behind me is the "Sanctuary of Eva" -- the elders that guide the Elves of Light dwell here. It is also a place for young Elves to train in swordsmanship and magic.
